mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.name `name`, m.component component, m.path path, m.sort sort, m.create_time createTime, m.update_time update_time FROM t_admin_user_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN t_admin_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_admin_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_admin_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.user_id = #{userId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id order by m.sort
